actions: Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, strengthens Jing, tonifies Qi and nourishes the Blood.
With Shu Di Huang, for chronic weakness and debility.
Tonifies the Kidneys and strengthens Yang.
With Yin Yang Huo, to accentuate the effects of the herb.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang and increases the libido.
With Shan Yao, enhances its functions.
With Xian Mao, for chills and infertility.
Strengthens Yang, nourishes Yin, astringes Jing and urine, benefits the marrow and tonifies the Kidneys and Liver.
Tonifies Kidney Yin and astringes Jing.
Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, nourishes the Blood and nourishes Jing
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, disperses Cold and regulates the menses.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Yin.
Strongly enriches Yin, nourishes Jing and Blood and fills the Marrow.
With Dang Gui, for Blood Deficiency marked by dizziness, palpitations, insomnia and menstrual dysfunction.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Blood and Yin and benefits Jing.
With Shu Di Huang, for Liver and Kidney Deficiency.
Tonifies the Kidneys
Nourishes Jing
Enriches Yin
Nourishes Blood
syndromes: Kidney Yin, Yang and Jing Deficiency

symptoms: Lumbago: low back feels cold, weak and aching
Urinary frequency with abundant, clear urine or
Maybe chronic diarrhea or "cock crow" diarrhea
Graying or whitening of the hair
Atrophy and weakness of the feet with difficulty walking
manifestations.tongue: Pale red or Pale and swollen
manifestations.tongueCoat: Thin, white and dry or Little or None
manifestations.pulse: Thready and rapid or Weak or Deep and thready - maybe slow
